text: Has anyone ever made a fontawesome choice dropdown in a custom module before that shows the icons to the marketer to choose from not just the class name?
I don't think that's something you could do
I usually add a link to the FontAwesome reference page in the field description <http://fontawesome.io/icons/>
I've actually seen this done on a template before. It's been quite awhile so I can't point you to which one though unfortunately.
I actually figured it out. Just had to load in the fontawesome css and font files into HubSpot
It's done in VAST theme also with an older fontawesome set.
is there a way to preview a change made to the blog template when viewing a topic? like /blog/topic/a-random-topic
I know you can use the design manager to preview post view and listing view, but the code I added `{% if topic%}` would only be shown on a topic page, and neither of those two currently available.
Same with Author or All pages views! Would be great to get views of these in the Design Manager as well.
With the new modules, you’ll still be able to do it, but you’ll need to use SVGs in the choices because you won’t be able to load fonts in the choice field.
